verses.verse: I say <S%G3004><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> I lie <S%G5574><s%> not, my conscience <S%G4893><s%> also <S%G4828><s%> bearing <S%G4828><s%> me witness <S%G4828><s%> in the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%>
That I have <S%G2076><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> heaviness <S%G3077><s%> and continual <S%G88><s%> sorrow <S%G3601><s%> in my heart. <S%G2588><s%>

For I could wish <S%G2172><s%> that myself <S%G846><s%> were accursed <S%G331><s%> from Christ <S%G5547><s%> for my brothers, <S%G80><s%> my kinsmen <S%G4773><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh: <S%G4561><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> are Israelites; <S%G2475><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> pertains the adoption, <S%G5206><s%> and the glory, <S%G1391><s%> and the covenants, <S%G1242><s%> and the giving <S%G3548><s%> of the law, <S%G3548><s%> and the service <S%G2999><s%> of God, and the promises; <S%G1860><s%>

Whose <S%G3739><s%> are the fathers, <S%G3962><s%> and of whom <S%G3739><s%> as concerning <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> came, who <S%G3588><s%> is over <S%G1909><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> blessed <S%G2128><s%> for ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

Not as though <S%G3754><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> has taken none <S%G1601><s%> effect. <S%G1601><s%> For they are not all <S%G3956><s%> Israel, <S%G2474><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are of Israel: <S%G2474><s%>

Neither, <S%G3761><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they are the seed <S%G4690><s%> of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> are they all <S%G3956><s%> children: <S%G5043><s%> but, In Isaac <S%G2464><s%> shall your seed <S%G4690><s%> be called. <S%G2564><s%>

That is, They which are the children <S%G5043><s%> of the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> are not the children <S%G5043><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> but the children <S%G5043><s%> of the promise <S%G1860><s%> are counted <S%G3049><s%> for the seed. <S%G4690><s%>

For this <S%G3778><s%> is the word <S%G3056><s%> of promise, <S%G1860><s%> At <S%G2596><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> will I come, <S%G2064><s%> and Sarah <S%G4564><s%> shall have <S%G2071><s%> a son. <S%G5207><s%>

And not only <S%G3440><s%> this; but when Rebecca <S%G4479><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> had conceived <S%G2845><s%> <S%G2192><s%> by one, <S%G1520><s%> even by our father <S%G3962><s%> Isaac; <S%G2464><s%>

(For the children being not yet <S%G3380><s%> born, <S%G1080><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> having done <S%G4238><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> good <S%G18><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> evil, <S%G2556><s%> that the purpose <S%G4286><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to election <S%G1589><s%> might stand, <S%G3306><s%> not of works, <S%G2041><s%> but of him that calls; <S%G2564><s%>)
It was said <S%G4483><s%> to her, The elder <S%G3187><s%> shall serve <S%G1398><s%> the younger. <S%G1640><s%>
As it is written, <S%G1125><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> have <S%G2071><s%> I loved, <S%G25><s%> but Esau <S%G2269><s%> have <S%G2071><s%> I hated. <S%G3404><s%>
What <S%G5101><s%> shall we say <S%G2046><s%> then? <S%G3767><s%> Is there unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> with God? <S%G2316><s%> God <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> forbid. <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%>

For he said <S%G3004><s%> to Moses, <S%G3475><s%> I will have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on whom <S%G3739><s%> I will have mercy, <S%G1653><s%> and I will have compassion <S%G3627><s%> on whom <S%G3739><s%> I will have compassion. <S%G3627><s%>
So <S%G686><s%> then <S%G686><s%> it is not of him that wills, <S%G2309><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> of him that runs, <S%G5143><s%> but of God <S%G2316><s%> that shows <S%G1653><s%> mercy. <S%G1653><s%>

For the scripture <S%G1124><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%G5328><s%> Even for this <S%G5124><s%> same <S%G846><s%> purpose have I raised <S%G1825><s%> you up, that I might show <S%G1731><s%> my power <S%G1411><s%> in you, and that my name <S%G3686><s%> might be declared <S%G1229><s%> throughout <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the earth. <S%G1093><s%>
Therefore <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767><s%> has he mercy <S%G1653><s%> on whom <S%G3739><s%> he will <S%G2309><s%> have mercy, and whom <S%G3739><s%> he will <S%G2309><s%> he hardens. <S%G4645><s%>
You will say <S%G2046><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> to me, Why <S%G5101><s%> does he yet <S%G2089><s%> find fault? <S%G3201><s%> For who <S%G5101><s%> has resisted <S%G436><s%> his will? <S%G1013><s%>

No <S%G3304><s%> but, O man, <S%G444><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> you that reply <S%G470><s%> against <S%G470><s%> God? <S%G2316><s%> Shall the thing <S%G4110><s%> formed <S%G4110><s%> say <S%G2046><s%> to him that formed <S%G4110><s%> it, Why <S%G5101><s%> have you made <S%G4160><s%> me thus? <S%G3779><s%>

Has <S%G2192><s%> not the potter <S%G2763><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> over the clay, <S%G4081><s%> of the same <S%G846><s%> lump <S%G5445><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> one vessel <S%G4632><s%> to honor, <S%G5092><s%> and another <S%G3739><s%> to dishonor? <S%G819><s%>

What if <S%G1487><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> willing <S%G2309><s%> to show <S%G1731><s%> his wrath, <S%G3709><s%> and to make <S%G1107><s%> his power <S%G1415><s%> known, <S%G1107><s%> endured <S%G5342><s%> with much <S%G4183><s%> long-suffering <S%G3115><s%> the vessels <S%G4632><s%> of wrath <S%G3709><s%> fitted <S%G2675><s%> to destruction: <S%G684><s%>

And that he might make <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> the riches <S%G4149><s%> of his glory <S%G1391><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the vessels <S%G4632><s%> of mercy, <S%G1656><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he had before <S%G4282><s%> prepared <S%G4282><s%> to glory, <S%G1391><s%>
Even <S%G2532><s%> us, whom <S%G3739><s%> he has called, <S%G2564><s%> not of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> of the Gentiles? <S%G1484><s%>

As he said <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in Osee, <S%G5617><s%> I will call <S%G2564><s%> them my people, <S%G2992><s%> which were not my people; <S%G2992><s%> and her beloved, <S%G25><s%> which was not beloved. <S%G25><s%>

And it shall come <S%G1511><s%> to pass, that in the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> it was said <S%G4483><s%> to them, You are not my people; <S%G2992><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall they be called <S%G2564><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Esaias <S%G2268><s%> also <S%G1161><s%> cries <S%G2896><s%> concerning <S%G5228><s%> Israel, <S%G2474><s%> Though <S%G1437><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%> be as the sand <S%G285><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> a remnant <S%G2640><s%> shall be saved: <S%G4982><s%>

For he will finish <S%G4931><s%> the work, <S%G3056><s%> and cut <S%G4932><s%> it short <S%G4932><s%> in righteousness: <S%G1343><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> a short <S%G4932><s%> work <S%G3056><s%> will the Lord <S%G2962><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> on the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And as Esaias <S%G2268><s%> said <S%G4280><s%> before, <S%G4280><s%> Except <S%G1508><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> of Sabaoth <S%G4519><s%> had left <S%G1459><s%> us a seed, <S%G4690><s%> we had been <S%G1096><s%> as Sodoma, <S%G4670><s%> and been made <S%G3666><s%> like <S%G3666><s%> to Gomorrha. <S%G1116><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> shall we say <S%G2046><s%> then? <S%G3767><s%> That the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> followed <S%G1377><s%> not after righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> have attained <S%G2638><s%> to righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> even <S%G1161><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is of faith. <S%G4102><s%>

But Israel, <S%G2474><s%> which followed <S%G1377><s%> after the law <S%G3551><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> has not attained <S%G5348><s%> to the law <S%G3551><s%> of righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>

Why? <S%G1302><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> they sought <S%G2212><s%> it not by faith, <S%G4102><s%> but as it were by the works <S%G2041><s%> of the law. <S%G3551><s%> For they stumbled <S%G4350><s%> at that stumbling stone; <S%G3037><s%>

As it is written, <S%G1125><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I lay <S%G5087><s%> in Sion <S%G4622><s%> a stumbling stone <S%G3037><s%> <S%G4348><s%> and rock <S%G4073><s%> of offense: <S%G4625><s%> and whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him shall not be ashamed. <S%G2617><s%>
